lore: When a Sparktail reaches maturity, they gain the ability to breathe out of water. That is why many of these creatures have decided to leave Blue Emerald and integrate into other societies.\n\nSparktail Professors are the cornerstone of their community. Even though they can teach anywhere, their most vital task is to oversee the learning of the children of their kind, as once they take the Step, there is no turning back. Even when out of the water, the Professors' tails allow them to move small objects without touching them.
menagerieDialog: I don't feel like fighting anymore. Mind switching me out for a different creature? I need my rest.
Let me guess: you're here to make yet another "fish out of water" joke, aren't you? I've heard them all before.
(This creature moves surprisingly fast, even on land.)
What's wrong, {PLAYERNAME}? You look like a fish out of water. Baaaaaaah hahaha...\n\nNo? Okay.
You should build a strong team of creatures that don't rely too much on offense or defense. Balance is key.
name: Sparktail Professor
